Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lawndale/27th
ShortDescription: Northbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park, 26th and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park, 26th and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Trains bypassing Jackson
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Jackson due to an medical emergency.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Jackson due to an medical emergency.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: 95th/Dan Ryan-bound Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Fullerton and Cermak due to an medical emergency.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Fullerton and Cermak due to an medical emergency.

Red Line service to 95th/Dan Ryan

After stopping at Fullerton, 95th-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Armitage (accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Cermak-Chinatown and make all normal stops to 95th/Dan Ryan.

Connections can be made between Howard-bound subway service and 95th-bound rerouted service via elevated lines at Fullerton (accessible), State/Lake (board at nearby elevated station on Orange Line side for 95th-bound Red Line service) and at Roosevelt (accessible).

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between Fullerton and State/Lake.

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
